name: Rounded & Opacity Fading Navbar for Level Palace.
description: This is a rounded and opacity fading navbar for Level Palace. It has opacity set to .85 for the nav bar and an animation of 1.25secs of ease-in-out to normal opacity. Hope you enjoy!!~
additional_info:
Made by spf180 with help of several sites.
v1.0
BUGS: Square Highlighting of the icons.
v1.1
BUGFIX: Square Highlighting of the icons.
